item.title: new year new blog
item.description: as the title suggest i hope this will be the beginning of an exciting journey of sharing experiences and things about software and all things in between. first time doing something like this so hope this can eventually be of use to as many people as possible. thank you again for making the time scroll through and check this out :)!
